APARTMENTS:
The difference between an apartments and flats consists a fenced-in adjacent territory in the apartments, what is the reason for communal expenses to be slightly higher than for the flats.
It is also important to understand that the owner of the apartments has the right to use them not only for personal residency or renting it, but he has rights to make there, for example, a mini-hotel and rent it out on a daily bases. Neighbors' permission for this type of business for apartments, in most countries, is not required.
There are also specific differences for different country . For example, in Russia it is impossible to register an apartment as a place of permanent residence, as well as to receive a tax deduction for that.
Based of that, apartments in Russia are cheaper than flats.

SECURE_TRANSACTION_AND_SHIPPING_INCLUDED:
Ensure a safe transaction. 
Shipping included
A secure deal is enabled in the Profile Settings or when publishing an ad.  Delivery can be enabled in the item card.
SENT_EMAIL_PASSWORD RESET: An email was sent to the mailbox you specified to reset your password
SET_UP_AREA_SEARCH_BY MYSELF: Set up a personalized search area
SHOP_FROM_ANY_POINT_OF_WORLD: Make purchases directly from anywhere in the world and without intermediaries! Why limit yourself when the whole world is in your hands?

SPAM_DESCRIPTION: Re-posting an advertisement for the same product

STOP_FOLLOWING_THE_PRICE_MESSAGE: The price of this product is no longer tracked
SUBSCRIBE_NEW_ADS_PRICE_CHANGES: Subscribe to new advertisements. Be the first to know about discounts on products you are interested in!

subscriptions is in the section

SUBSCRIPTION_REMOVED_TEXT: New seller ads will no longer appear in your favorites.
SUBSCRIPTION_SEARCH_SAVED: Search subscription {{name}} successfully saved. You can find and share your saved searches on the Favorites page. You can also unsubscribe using this page.

SUBSCRIPTION_TEXT_EMPTY_2: A list of users who subscribed to you will be displayed here
SUCCESSFUL_REGISTRATION: You have successfully registered. It's time to find something interesting, or place your first advertisement!
TELL_YOU_FOUND_AD_ON_ADVERTO: Please mention that you found this advertisement on ADVERTO
THANKS_FOR_SETTING_OTHER: Thank you! Your data has been saved and will be considered by our system
THIS_USER_HAS_NO_FOLLOWERS_YET: This user has no followers yet
THIS_USER_HAS_NO_SUBSCRIPTIONS_YET: This user has no subscriptions yet
TIP_DESCRIPTION_CREATE_ADV:
You can add a title and description in other languages. 

Do not include contact details and links in the description. 
There are special fields for this.
TIP_FOR_ADDING_A_PHOTO:
The first photo will be displayed in the search results, choose the best one.
You can upload up to {{maxPhotos}} photos in JPG or PNG format.
  The maximum photo size is 25 Mb.
TIP_FOR_VIDEO: According to statistics, an ad with a video is viewed 5 times more often
TIP_MAP_CREATE_ADS:
Choose between the exact location
or radius, switching modes
using buttons
